QuestData.Title: The Elementium Axe
QuestData.Description: The Twilight cowards have captured and killed too many red dragons, but one yet lives. Do you remember Lirastrasza? She's shackled nearby and we're going to free her.$B$BBut first, we need something sharp enough to cut through her chains.$B$BThere's an old ettin named Blindeye the Guardian. He stands watch at the Altar of Ascension to the south.$B$BHe has a purely-wrought Elementium axe. I wonder if that's Cho'gall's "ultimate" weapon?
QuestData.CompletionText: Do you have the axe? They're going to kill Lirastrasza soon.
QuestData.RewardText: That thing looks sharp. Sharp enough to do the deed, at least.$B$BBut if I'm a judge of weaponry, that's not what Cho'gall's after.
